ErrorMessage.title: An samu matsala tattare da wannan mai rarrabawa :(

RecentSubjects.text: Tattauna batu a kan shafin Maga, ko ku sanya a cikin Waɗanda Kuka Fi So ko a rukuni.
RecentSubjects.title: Rabonku da ya gabata

WorkflowAssignmentModal.confirm: Kai ni zuwa aiki na gaba!
WorkflowAssignmentModal.content: Muna taya ku murna! Kasancewar kuna ƙoƙari sosai, yanzu za ku iya buɗe wani aiki na daban. Idan kun fi son ku kasance a wannan aikin na yanzu, to kuna iya zaɓen tsayawa tare da shi.
WorkflowAssignmentModal.dismiss: Kada a sake nuna wannan a zangon nan
WorkflowAssignmentModal.title: Sabon Aikin Da Ake Da Shi

MessageFromResearcher.noMessage: Ku haɗu da tawagar mai manazarcin a kan Magana domin samun ƙarin bayani game da wannan aiki!
MessageFromResearcher.title: Saƙo daga manazarcin

RecentSubjects.error: An samu matsala yayin buɗe maudu'an:
RecentSubjects.noSubjects: Da alama babu wanda ya yi tsokaci a kan batu tukuna. Ku je kan shafin Magana domin kasancewa na farko!

ZooniverseTalk.message: Ku tattauna tare da tawagar binciken da sauran 'yan sa-kai
ZooniverseTalk.title: Shafin Magana na Zooniverse
